data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Daniel Schlager awards the home team a throw-in.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bremen take a 1-0 lead thanks to Maximilian Eggestein.
That's a fine assist from Theodor Gebre Selassie.
In the minute 6, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Schlager awards Bremen a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Bremen in the half of Hoffenheim.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hoffenheim's Munas Dabbur has run offside.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, At Weserstadion, Hoffenheim are penalized for being offside.
Christoph Baumgartner of Hoffenheim gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick Hoffenheim.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at Weserstadion.
In the minute 20, Hoffenheim advance rapidly upfield but Daniel Schlager blows for offside.
Hoffenheim are pushing forward but Diadie Samassekou's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bremen.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Dennis Geiger.
Sebastian Rudy instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 23, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Bremen.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 25, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Bremen drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Daniel Schlager awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Daniel Schlager signals a throw-in for Hoffenheim, close to Bremen's area.
Hoffenheim's Robert Skov breaks free at Weserstadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bremen have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Daniel Schlager signals a Bremen throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 29, Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Throw-in Bremen.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 30, Free kick Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim pushes forward through Sebastian Rudy, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in high up the field for Bremen in Bremen.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bremen close to the penalty box.
Can Bremen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Niclas Fullkrug is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bremen make their first substitution with Yuya Osako replacing Niclas Fullkrug.
In the minute 39, Bremen have a dangerous throw-in.
Bremen are in shooting range from this free kick.
Bremen are coming forward and Leonardo Bittencourt gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Bremen.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Bremen.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Munas Dabbur for Hoffenheim drives towards goal at Weserstadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Robert Skov for Hoffenheim gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 45, In Bremen Bremen attack through Leonardo Bittencourt. The finish is off target, however.
Daniel Schlager awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Hoffenheim's Munas Dabbur is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim's Robert Skov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Bremen at Weserstadion.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Weserstadion.
In the minute 46, Daniel Schlager signals a Bremen throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Hoffenheim close to the penalty box.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Can Hoffenheim capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bremen's half?
Bremen have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
In Bremen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 53, Daniel Schlager signals a Bremen throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Bremen.
Bremen push upfield but Daniel Schlager quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Bremen at Weserstadion.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniel Schlager awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, In Bremen, Bremen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Stefan Posch (Hoffenheim) gets a yellow card.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Sebastian Hoeness is making the team's first substitution at Weserstadion with Klauss replacing Jacob Bruun Larsen.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of Bremen.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Bremen.
In the minute 65, Hoffenheim needs to be cautious. Bremen have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 70, Daniel Schlager signals a Bremen throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Bremen's Leonardo Bittencourt misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bremen.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Kevin Mohwald is replacing Christian Gross for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 73, Bremen have a goal kick.
Yuya Osako gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bremen.
Bremen needs to be cautious. Hoffenheim have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Christoph Baumgartner with Mijat Gacinovic.
The away team have replaced Munas Dabbur with Sargis Adamyan. This is the third substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Hoffenheim at Weserstadion.
Bremen will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hoffenheim.
Marco Friedl (Bremen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 80, In Bremen Hoffenheim drive forward through Robert Skov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hoffenheim drives forward and Klauss gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Bremen.
Can Bremen capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Bremen.
In the minute 84, Hoffenheim's Robert Skov gets in a shot on goal at Weserstadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Bremenâ€™s Yuya Osako and play has been suspended briefly.
Yuya Osako is back on his feet again.
In the minute 86, Ryan Sessegnon is on a sub for Robert Skov for Hoffenheim.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Yuya Osako is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Tahith Chong is replacing Yuya Osako for the home team.
Hoffenheim advance rapidly upfield but Daniel Schlager blows for offside.
In the minute 88, Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Bremen.
Mijat Gacinovic (Hoffenheim) has received a first yellow card.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 89, Daniel Schlager awards the home team a throw-in.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Bremen territory.
Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Bremen at Weserstadion.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Bremen. The final score is 1-1.
Theodor Gebre Selassie is booked for the home team.
